user_reviews_extended.Name: Vijayanath Thuraisingam (VJ)
user_reviews_extended.Description: Guys at the parramatta LDV are working hard and doing a great job, I needed a vehicle urgently and within 2 days I had the keys for my LDV g10. Finance lady, sales person, receptionist and the managers went above and beyond. I felt like customer‚Äôs satisfaction was their priority . I hope every customers have the same experience or even better experience than I had. I would go back again.

user_reviews_extended.Name: David Sackie
user_reviews_extended.Description: Great reception, great vibes very friendly staff and helpful, will recommend to families and friends anytime.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Miranda Lu
user_reviews_extended.Description: Deepika was incredibly knowledgeable, patient and supportive in helping us choose a car. We had a great experience thanks to her professional attitude. Definitely recommend her to reach out to!

user_reviews_extended.Name: Krunal Patel
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I had a really good experience at LDV Parramatta. Recently purchase LDV D90. Venu was really helpful with everything. He explained everything in detail and answer/cleared all our doubts/questions. He actually
did a fantastic job for me  and helped us in getting our car quicker than expected. I would recommend anyone wanting a car and wanting to deal with nice people at the same time.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Gagan Singla
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I recently bought my D90 from this place.
It was a great experience. The staff, especially Venugopal was very supportive through the whole process. I really loved the way he went about his business. He even went out of his way to help me at one stage. And lastly the vehicle arrived before the delivery date.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Malath
user_reviews_extended.Description: I would like to wholeheartedly thank James and John from LDV Parramatta for their extraordinary service. John was extremely friendly and helpful in finding me the correct vehicle with the colour and specs I was after. James was also amazing and financing was made a breeze. John pushed very hard to have my car ready as soon as possible while James obtained the best possible deal for finance and insurance. Very satisfied with the service and would 110% recommend John and James from LDV Parramatta to anyone looking at buying an LDV. Thank you guys!

user_reviews_extended.Name: Marie Tupaea
user_reviews_extended.Description: Myself & my husband purchased a Mifa Mode a couple of weeks  ago and unfortunately not a good experience all round. From the moment we walked into the dealer to look at the car to when we picked up the car. The salesman we dealt with from beginning to end did not communicate well. Unfortunately I would not recommend LDV parramatta.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Sue McArthur
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Went in to see John about a new vehicle we saw on car sales ended up purchasing same day and picking up 48 hours later!
John was fantastic from start to finish!
He kept to his promises and his communication was exactly what i would expect.
After dealing with another company since November who made promises and lacked the communication skills to keep us updated John was a breath of fresh air, only wish we had seen him first and not wasted 3 months waiting for a car that was never delivered.

Thanks to John and the team for a great experience

user_reviews_extended.Name: arlene deguzman
user_reviews_extended.Description: It was a great experience. The staff are happy to help especially Venugopal was very supportive through the whole process. I really loved the way he went about his business. And the vehicle arrived 5 weeks earlier the delivery date.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Tav Roy
user_reviews_extended.Description: Please do yourself a favour and avoid this dealership, and company at all costs. I bought a brand new vehicle at the end of 2021 and had a transmission failure one year in. It took over 4 months to repair, in addition to a plethora of other issues. The dealership and LDV has underdelivered, lied, and has not offered to keep a very disappointed customer. Please stick with a reliable brand and save your money and the headache you will have with this company.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Kade Edwards
user_reviews_extended.Description: Put a refundable deposit down on a new car in April 2023 and still haven't heard back after multiple attempts of contact. Salesperson was good, but disappointing management. Don't put a deposit down unless you're serious or want to lose your money. They will like be a classic car salesperson and guilt you to pay a deposit to lock in the last car, buy a Toyota instead.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Nik
user_reviews_extended.Description: Great experience dealing with salesperson Nizar. Genuine & professional. Got a good deal on an MG3. Even picked us up in courtesy vehicle to take delivery. Highly recommend this dealership.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Eddy David
user_reviews_extended.Description:
The staff at LDV Parramatta in particular Mr Venu, was was helpful, professional and great to deal with. I purchased a new LDV T60 Luxe and the purchase and all of the experience was a breeze. Venu was great to deal with. He knew vehicles, was very helpful and was not pushy at all. Was happy to answer questions and happy to assist in organizing finances etc.
We came to a minor hurdle and Venu was quick on rectifying everything to ensure I continued to have a pleasant experience.

I very highly recommend you reach out to Venu for your next vehicle purchase and highly recommend LDV Parramatta.

I purchase a new vehicle every 2 or 3 years and will definitely go back to this dealership and have already recommended Venu and LDV Parramatta to family and friends.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Glenn Dicky
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Had an air conditioner belt replaced on December 20,  2023. Paid over $240.00.
Less than 4 months later,April 17, 2024 the belt snapped again. Expected LDV Paramatta to replace it under their warranty but was told warranty does not cover ‚Äúconsumables‚Äù.
Very disappointed as I would expect a belt to last longer than 4 months. To me either the product was faulty or it was not installed correctly.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Gagan Singla
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I have reviewed early after buying my LDV and rated them 5 stars but I think I spoke too soon.
Doesn‚Äôt not deserve even 1 star. Car display unit blacked out and firstly I waited 4 weeks to be booked in and when they had the car for the whole day they could not fix it. Needed to keep the car overnight or rebook it which is again 3 weeks wait. Out of the world service.

user_reviews_extended.Name: ning tong
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Great car, Best team!
Thanks Saad and Kim, I am greatful for everything you done for me and I would recommand this car dealership to all my friends!

user_reviews_extended.Name: Adam Spiteri
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I went to LDV Parramatta and when I First saw the dealership I was impressed with quality of the dealership, staff, and all the vehicles they had there. the place was well presented. Saad had a very nice approach to me to see what I needed and was very helpful to assist to show me the D90 diesel that I had inquired about. he showed me all the features of the D90 and all the safety features it had too. he also mentioned all the latest upgraded on the newest model. I would like to have a longer test drive to be honest, to show the capability of the D90.
Saad was really great to talk to and he helped me every step of the way, sorting out extras like floor mats, colour and a tow-bar for a great price.
he then took me to the other staff to sort out extras like paint protection and other offers the dealership offer which was a great service the have, the had a offer on and were more than happy to let me know to save me a bit more on the perchance which was nice.
picking up the car on the day was amazing, Saad went through everything top to bottom of the D90 showing me all the added extras of the new model, I was so impressed with, and very happy with my decision on buying the D90, especially from Saad.

After driving it for almost two weeks I know I have made an amazing purchase and really love driving the D90. it has so much style, comfort, power and plenty for space for my family.

Thank you so much LDV and Saad for everything.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Suresh
user_reviews_extended.Description: The service center(Service booking desk and spare parts) never picks the phone call, always waiting time more than an hour. I never ever recommend LDV deliver 9 vans for new buyers, Spare parts are very hard to get on time. you should wait.14 days mostly. very poor quality in products/customer service and responsibilities.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Ram chandra GNAWALI
user_reviews_extended.Description: Thank you Nima for your professional advice and helping me throughout purchasing journey LDV t60 luxe . Loved driving it!!

user_reviews_extended.Name: Dolly Boufarraa
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Amazing customer service and we bought a Ute by Venue he was very nice and respectful and he was very honest, all the customer service there they are very friendly and caring.
And also when we were going to get the Ute Saad was very nice and he really really helped us. I really recommend going to LDV parramatta I wish I can put more than 5 star that is how amazing they are.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Robert Pellegriti
user_reviews_extended.Description: I purchased a second hand vehicle from Nizar Budmilic and was very impressed with his customer service and professionalism. I had been looking for a car and had visited several car dealerships and was totally over the whole process. Nizar was really easy to deal with - no pushy tactics or insults to my really old vehicle I was trading in - just positive discussion around negotiation about what was possible. I was unable to get to the yard and Nizar drove the car over to my place at short notice. For my next vehicle, I will definitely be calling Nizar.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Harry Kahla
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Venu was expectional and unbelievable with his knowledge and service. I am happy with his process and kind shown in.
I am planning another vehicle soon. I recommend venu @ldv Parramatta. He will looking after you for sure.

user_reviews_extended.Name: audio addiction
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Read some "real" reviews after seeing a bloke start a fire in the shop, people don't do stuff like this for no reason! I hope there's an investigation on this joint.

Hardcore lemon laws need to be introduced asap to stop these dodgy dealers pushing people over the edge. I hope the guy today is ok and gets off lightly.

user_reviews_extended.Name: michael sayour
user_reviews_extended.Description: Saad gave me an amazing experience throughout the whole process from the point of meeting him to the delivery of my vehicle. I highly recommend buying an LDV from Saad.

user_reviews_extended.Name: A N
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Would NOT recommend. Bought a car and after 6 months took it to the mechanics due to multiple issues which were not disclosed and realised that there were parts which were rusted and an old crack in the coolant area. It says on the contract that the car is fully serviced but clearly not and they‚Äôre happy to sell faulty car.
The locks to the doors also were faulty and contacted them multiple times due to the ‚Äúwarranty‚Äù they offered but their response was ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not our issue, you‚Äôve got to ask our service department‚Äù. We then contacted them and they said it‚Äôs the sales person‚Äôs responsibility.
Honestly useless‚Ä¶ would never buy from them again.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Manjunath Hukkeri (Sydney)
user_reviews_extended.Description: I recently bought LDV D90 car from LDV Parramatta . The team at LDV Paramatta (especially Saad) were amazing.  Saad was very patient , he showed me car options to consider and explain very well in details, delivered as promised.. would definitely recommend LDV Parramatta to everyone!

user_reviews_extended.Name: Vicky Fikis
user_reviews_extended.Description:
7.7.23 Just picked up our brand new LDV g10+ van with all the additional add ons we requested. Very happy with everything.
I would personally like to thank John for being the person he is.
1. Friendly 2.Understanding 3. Knowledgeable 4.Patient.... BUT most of all , I really appreciate his HONESTY.
John was there for us from start to finish. He was available whenever we needed him and always kept us updated with the progress.
At this point, I would also like to thank Oksana, who finalised all the paper work and especially for organising insurance for the van , so we could drive home stress free.
Overall, our experience at LDV PARRAMATTA was great! Staff and the appearance of the site were very welcoming. Thank you. Vicky

user_reviews_extended.Name: Siva Kandasamy
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Great experience, venu is very helpful from the day one to booking the order, within 3 days I received my vehicle. The commitment he gave was fulfilled in time also the other team muskan from finance was very easy and fast and Nina predelivery coodinator is very helpful.
Overall the parramatta are very helpful and great customer service.
Thanks

user_reviews_extended.Name: Michael Maran
user_reviews_extended.Description:
What do you hope to achieve when buying a new vehicle.
1. A good deal
2. A stream lined hassle free experience
3. Good communication throughout the entire process
Saad Kanawati and the team at LDV Parramatta have achieved all that and more.
I highly recommend Saad Kanawati and the team at LDV Parramatta for exceeding my expectations and more.
Saad is an affable, happy-go-lucky guy that loves to listen and help. I'm confident he won't let you down. I know you'll be as impressed as I am.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Zaya Akhlaq
user_reviews_extended.Description:
It was an amazing experience with LDV Parramatta while looking for Van for my business
I would like to personally thanks to John who made this transaction very smoothly.
I gave 7 ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è to John for his service
Highly appreciated.
Looking forward to get next Van from you soon.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Selina Smyth
user_reviews_extended.Description:
We highly recommend LDV Parramatta & sales person Saad.

We recently purchased a van for our business from Saad!

Saad provided excellent customer service, he listened to our needs and wants and showed us all options available to us. We will be back to purchase more vehicles from Saad.

Remember to ask for Saad when you arrive at LDV Parramatta, he will take care of you.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Damon Wilkinson
user_reviews_extended.Description: Lovely team at LDV parramatta! Making the car purchase smooth and easy

user_reviews_extended.Name: Andrew B
user_reviews_extended.Description: I bought a vehicle from here a few months ago. The sales rep who pushed hard for the sale then got the funds. Once they received the cash they could not wait to get me out the door. I asked numerous times for the transfer rego slip  that you  normally get and I was brushed off numerous times. I eventually got a fine from the motor registry for not doing this. The sales rep then blamed even though I attempted to try and rectify this early on. Their after care is very poor and they only look for the sale and push you out once they have their funds. I would give zero stars if I could as it was really poor service after 30 years of buying cars from other places. I would avoid this place, unless you are willing to take the risk of poor after market assistance.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Avic Belleza
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Emerald is a very nice, accomodating and helpful person. He would do everything for a client to achieve the dreams of having a brand new car despite circumstances.
He makes dealership easy to understand and make sure it will be a quick purchase.
Emerald of Ldv parramatta in granville made us feel that we are already a family.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Andre Nohra
user_reviews_extended.Description: Salesman John was an absolute pleasure to work with during the duration of purchasing and finalising delivery. Couldn't have asked for a better salesman to help me out during the process of purchasing a new car. Highly recommend him in future

user_reviews_extended.Name: Ashton Lavaring
user_reviews_extended.Description: Although I didn't end up buying my ute here, they were very helpful in making my decision. I did give 5 stars because of the service I received at the LDV service center at Rosehill. They did a great job in figuring out the problems, ordering and replacing parts and the speed! I have had a lot of experience with other car manufactures service centers and LDV has been the best experience thus far.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Ankitkumar Patel
user_reviews_extended.Description: I gave LDV five stars right away after purchasing it, however I believe I spoke too soon. Does not even deserve one star. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND ANYONE TO BUY A LDV VEHICLE. After 3 months of buying a brand new LDV, the van brokedown due to engine problem. I called the service department many times but they still didn‚Äôt slove my problem and it‚Äôs been 3 weeks. I‚Äôm still waiting and cause of that I‚Äôm having a great loss in my business.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Yazan Sawaqed
user_reviews_extended.Description: All staff at the dealership are awesome and professional. Good deals and they are lovely cars at the showroom. Enjoyed the time there and thanks for the new car.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Teresa Toca
user_reviews_extended.Description: I would like to say big thank you to LDV Team for looking after us. Specially to James and Emerald who helped with our LDV UTE. They are friendly and very honest with their recommendations. They are not only to sell you a car but to give you the best quality and affordable car that fit's your budget. Need a UTE? Just call them and they won't dissappoint you. Good job! See you in our next car service.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Philippa
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Recently bought my car from the team at parramatta auto centre, I wish I could give them more than 5 stars.

It's the first car I've ever bought (myself) and they made me feel so comfortable and helped me understand the whole process from start to finish!!

Thank you for the wonderful experience, I will definitely be coming back for all my servicing needs xx

user_reviews_extended.Name: Mehdi Nouri
user_reviews_extended.Description: Terrible service, got a brand new LDV Ute but the headlight not working. Finally, after one month book a service,waste my time whole day then they said they donot have the part to fix. Been waiting another month to get the part. Tried to book a service again to fix headlight all booked for one month and I asked them to send the part to another dealership but they return the part without even telling me. So brand new car without headlight not fixed for three month, Waste two whole day in dealership and still not going to be fixed soon.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Sriman ch
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I had a great experience buying my LDV D90. Right from my visit to car delivery they have looked after me very well.

Love how they treat customers even after sales.

Special thanks to Venu Gopal and his team for the seamless transaction. Highly recommend this place.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Omar Sawan
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Just picked up my D90; fantastic assistance by John , was a very easy and simple transaction, felt more comfortable by LDV parramatta than I did audi/ bmw. Absolutely love the car cannot compare it to anything else with value for money. Definitely happy customer and now a long term one. Will be back in a few years.
A ++++++

user_reviews_extended.Name: Joanne Argyrou
user_reviews_extended.Description: I highly recommend the service team at LDV Parramatta. I've had my car serviced there twice now and I wouldn't go anywhere else. The customer service was impeccable. They went above and beyond and made sure I was happy. They were so understanding, and even changed my wipers for me while I sat in the car with my sleeping bubba!

user_reviews_extended.Name: Vimal P
user_reviews_extended.Description: Just purchased my first car, an MG3 Core. Was a pleasure dealing with the friendly team. A definite 5 star for their excellent customer service. Thanks to Terry, Jai and Daniel for all the support and help.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Gabriel Bar
user_reviews_extended.Description: Ldv Parramatta dealership was a great experience with the car sales team. Saad was great at organising and delivering the car that i wanted. Great ute t 60 max. And thanks, Saad.

user_reviews_extended.Name: layla vidgen
user_reviews_extended.Description: REPOST WITH REGO. should probs fix this guys car

user_reviews_extended.Name: Kathy Criniti
user_reviews_extended.Description: Couldn‚Äôt get a hold of them for well over 1 month (almost 2) then when we did had to wait 1 month for the initial service. Utility used for work and weekend coastal home. Went over kms and will not service without charging. So much more to say but could you waste the energy on pathetic service. I will say though when asked to escalate the issue ti a senior the young lady told us she was the only point of call. Dare I say this isn‚Äôt true and I would be concerned if there was no leadership. Protect your property DO NOT USE LDV PARRAMATTA. so many better options. Can‚Äôt give a zero, though I would if I could

user_reviews_extended.Name: Anita Yum
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I would like to say big thank you to LDV Parramatta!!!!! Excellent sales John Thomas, very professional, helpful and honest. Excellent finance team Oksana, make a smooth approval for our finance. Great work guys:) I would highly recommend LDV Parramatta.
Anita & Anthony

user_reviews_extended.Name: sandeep kamboj
user_reviews_extended.Description: Happy with the vehicle and service, Venu helped with all the information and delivered the vehicle before estimated delivery. He is excellent in dealing with customer and excellent team around. Very happy for it. I recommend everyone to buy from luv parramatta and meet Venu.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Modasser Raza
user_reviews_extended.Description:
below mentioned refund issue was resolved , i am changing the review stars.
Mr Venugopal Vasagouni,  If you are providing wrong information by mistake, better to accept the mistake.

Hi Team,
I have contacted you guys multiple times, even sent the email to Ian Mason, Dealer Principal, The manager Jai Patial, No one is taking the complain seriously. no one bothered to question Mr Venugopal Vasagouni why he provided wrong information and then lied he never provided that information.

we had a worst experience with sales person Venugopal Vasagouni at LDV Parramatta.
On the day of car purchase , we confirmed with him twice about the cancellation policy, he providee wrong information that cancellation charges will be 5% of the deposit money and now he is declining that he did not give this information. even he agreed over the phone that he has given same wrong information to few other customers and he has learnt from his mistake. but infront of his manager jai, he completely lied and started saying he did not give this information. what a disgrace guys.

And now we are fighing to get our money back.
Very bad experience, dodgy, and not reliable at all.

I am complaining to LDV Head office now, but honestly speaking , i have no more trust in the word LDV customer service. and i will speak out loud on Social Media/LDV groups about my bad experience with LDV Parramatta.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Harry Sandhu
user_reviews_extended.Description: Excellent customer service and happy with dealing venu ,good knowledge and vehicle delivered within time.

user_reviews_extended.Name: bradley riley
user_reviews_extended.Description: The  service from Daniel was great he returned my phone calls promptly and he had the extras fitted to my wishes. I have recommended  your business to many people in my area. Thank you for the great service.

user_reviews_extended.Name: J Webster
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Ian Mason the dealer principal is an amazing man,
I'm a very sick person with heart disease so stress of buying a car could of been confronting. Ian and his team was so friendly supportive and couldn't do enough for me I live interstate I purchased a SsangYong Korando SUV daily Ian would speak to either myself or my carer as the process went through. From the initial deposit to window tinting and detailing of the car. Then Ian guided me through transporting the car to my home address after this point Ian and his team still kept contact with myself asking me was I happy with the SUV and was there anything else I need it done I highly recommend this dealership.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Wendy Li
user_reviews_extended.Description: Service centre was not helpful at all, have been dealing with Craig for a warranty job for my G10 , had to ring up numerous times to just lock in a drop off date, then was told no parts had to bring the car back. Finally was able to drop off the car again for repair that was after me chasing up and making numerous phone calls. It‚Äôs not over yet, went there to pick up the car on the promised date then was told again it‚Äôs not ready!!  Never mind, called up and given a new pick up date, guess what? Not ready again!! It has wasted my time my friends time to come all the way to the service centre so many times and yet returned empty handed, not to mention the time off work as well, all of these were just because of they can‚Äôt give honest information or a simple phone call to advise me in advance! My car is still sitting in the service centre right now, I need this nightmare to be sorted out ASAP!

user_reviews_extended.Name: YJ Sun
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I bought a G10 at Ldv parramatta.  However, there have been many problems and have not been resolved yet.

1. I bought a new car, but I didn't get the logbook.

2. I bought a new car, but I didn't get a spare key.

3. When I bought a car, I added 3 extra seats, but Lego has 2 seats.

4. When I called the dealer, He made excuses saying it wasn't his fault.

5. dealer told me  ‚ÄúIt will solve everything when I go to the service center. ‚Äú

However, there is no reservation.  Lego can not change.
6. When I called the dealer, it was the responsibility of the service center, not his responsibility.

7. When I said that I didn't get the logbook and spare key, I said I'd check it, and there was no contact.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Robert Pitt
user_reviews_extended.Description: I can't recommend LDV Granville/ Parramatta  high enough. After dealing with John, ordering my T60 pro max and wanting all the extras put on, I'm very happy. Thankyou.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Dan McCarthy
user_reviews_extended.Description: Excellent service! Bloody hard street to get into and parking may be a challenge. Overall a very good dealership and seamless buying process.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Kelly Evans
user_reviews_extended.Description: I needed to purchase a car remotely. Nizar has very helpful and showed me through the car via facetime,  pointing out all the details and showing me though the log book. He also organised for the car to be transported to me. Easy communication and efficient, friendly service

user_reviews_extended.Name: ibrahim kabbout
user_reviews_extended.Description: Purchased the v80 van. John made the experience smooth. John was very helpful and professional through the whole sale process. 10/10

user_reviews_extended.Name: Paul Regis
user_reviews_extended.Description: The cars are well priced but it's hard to figure out the dealer. The gentleman I spoke was polite answered my questions, except 2 where he told me to go and find them out on the internet. He seemed to think that the car being cheap is enough of a sales strategy to remove the need for any other kind of sales approach. And that surely does LDV a disservice. "Buy the car, its cheap" is probably not a sales line that works on everyone.

user_reviews_extended.Name: inayat-ur rehman mohmand
user_reviews_extended.Description: Venu is a great person, I found him so kindly and friendly. Am appreciate it and wish him best of luck.

user_reviews_extended.Name: brett awada
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I went in on Wednesday to enquire about the new ute, I was dealing with John Thomas. He was very helpful and went out of his way to explain everything and was never in a rush even though it was busy there.
Thanks Jhon.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Yuki Neko
user_reviews_extended.Description: They are the worst car dealership to ever exist !!! The sales people and finance team are very rude but most importantly they have stolen $6000 dollars from me and they ended up keeping the remaining balance of my loan‚Ä¶ STAY AWAY at all cost I am reporting these people to fair trading and ombudsman

user_reviews_extended.Name: Phil Gough
user_reviews_extended.Description: Cant recommend Mike and the team here at LDV Parramatta enough. If I could give them 10 stars I would. They always give first class service and are very prompt in getting back to me. Thankyou guys and keep up the great work!

user_reviews_extended.Name: Samin Ramay
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Big thank you to LDV Team for looking after me they make my car purchase so smooth and enjoyable

Little bit of hiccups but overall Whole team is friendly and very honest with their recommendations.

See you in my next car service.

user_reviews_extended.Name: jack yu
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Happy with service and great customer service I have been to other dealer, but no should up and explained me about the vehicle venu showed lot effort in showing the vehicles and explaining them and given information what I need for.
I am very happy with Ldv parramatta.

user_reviews_extended.Description:

user_reviews_extended.Name: Itaua Batista
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I recently went to Parramatta LDV with my 21-year-old son (on the 6th of September 2025) to test drive the LDV T60 Max, and the whole experience was very disappointing.

During the test drive, the assistant manager barely explained anything about the vehicle ‚Äî I had to ask all the questions myself. When my son asked to try the car in sports mode, he hesitated before eventually putting it on, but only allowed my son to drive about 500 metres plus around 200m on sports mode before switching it back. That hardly gives a serious buyer any chance to properly experience the car.

When we sat down afterwards to discuss pricing, I asked for some extras to be included ‚Äî slide shutters for the canopy, tinted windows, a tow bar, and weather shields. I also asked about servicing, but the assistant manager couldn‚Äôt explain it properly, which was both surprising and unprofessional.

Finally, I said my budget was $45,500. His response was simply that he couldn‚Äôt do it and ‚Äúgood luck with it‚Äù ‚Äî no thank you, no courtesy, nothing. That was the final straw.

On the way home, my son looked at me and said he no longer wanted to buy an LDV at all because of the lack of attention we received at Parramatta LDV. This was especially heartbreaking because in just two days it will be his 22nd birthday, and all he wanted was to purchase his new ‚Äútoy‚Äù ‚Äî something he had been so excited about, especially since some of his friends already own one. Instead of being a happy milestone, it turned into a huge disappointment.

We‚Äôre in 2025, and sadly, discrimination still happens ‚Äî whether it was because my son was considered too young or perhaps because of my skin colour, we were clearly not given the same respect and attention as other customers. That is unacceptable.

If I knew I was going to be treated like that, I would have just bought a car from Marketplace. At least there, I wouldn‚Äôt have expected any customer service. Parramatta LDV turned what should have been a proud and exciting moment into one of the most disappointing experiences I‚Äôve had.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Mitch Bayat

user_reviews_extended.Name: Joel Celnikier
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I don‚Äôt usually go out of my way to leave a negative review, but my recent experience at Glendale LDV was definitely disappointing.

I visited this dealership 8 weeks ago to get my LDV T60 valued, and I was told to come back when the new model arrived. The original salesperson I dealt with was fine, but my experience took a turn for the worse when I was transferred to the business manager.

His attitude was passive-aggressive, and when I simply inquired about financing rates, I was taken aback by his response. I had a trade-in value of $28,000 weeks ago, but now he quoted me only $16,000. I understand that values can fluctuate, but this seemed excessive.

When I mentioned that I might seek financing elsewhere, the business manager's demeanor became even more dismissive and unprofessional. I found his attitude to be misleading, and I felt like I was being talked down to.

In the end, I chose to leave and found financing elsewhere at a much lower rate at a different LDV dealership, where I received a proper trade-in value.

Overall, I was left feeling frustrated and disrespected. I hope they can address these issues for future customers, as it seems there‚Äôs a lack of professionalism in the finance.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Ashley Holmes
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I am writing to express my disappointment with the lack of professionalism and communication I‚Äôve experienced from the LDV Service Department in Glendale, particularly with the receptionist, Georgia. Since my rust inspection was completed on June 12th, I have made several attempts to follow up on the status, with little to no proactive communication in return.

Despite being assured multiple times that I would receive a call back from the service manager, David, I only managed to get a response after following up repeatedly myself. When I did speak with him, I was told, rather abruptly, that the matter had been "handed to the Buy Back Team" and that "there is no need to keep calling." This response came off as dismissive and offered no real clarity or reassurance regarding the next steps.

Additionally, each time I‚Äôve contacted the Glendale location, I‚Äôve encountered a consistently rude and unhelpful tone from Georgia at the service desk. Rather than assisting or providing updates, her dismissive attitude has only added to the frustration.

I understand that certain processes may be out of the dealership‚Äôs hands, but the lack of basic communication and courtesy is unacceptable. I hope this feedback encourages the team to improve their approach to customer service and follow-through.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Never 3ver
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Avoid This Service Car Dealer at All Costs

My recent encounter with Lansvale LDV was beyond disappointing‚Äîit was outright appalling. Here are the reasons why I strongly discourage anyone from using their services:

Lack of Communication: Throughout the process, communication was abysmal. I had to constantly chase them for updates, and even then, there no answer

Unreasonably Long Wait Times: Despite assurances of prompt service, my car ended up languishing in their shop for much longer than initially promised. This caused significant inconvenience and disruption to my daily routine.

Unprofessional Attitude: The staff I interacted with displayed a dismissive and indifferent attitude towards my concerns. It was clear that customer satisfaction was not a priority for them.

Failure to Resolve Issues: Despite multiple attempts to address my dissatisfaction with their service, they showed no interest in rectifying the situation or offering any form of compensation for the inconvenience and wasted time.

In conclusion, my experience with Lansvale LDV  was a complete nightmare. Their incompetence, lack of communication and unprofessionalism make them a dealership to steer clear of. Save yourself the frustration and find a service provider that values honesty, competence, and customer satisfaction.

For the past 2 months I have tried calling him leaving messages  not once has he returned my call, because the part was under warranty. I bought 5 cars from them and this is the way they treat customers.  The service department is  pathetic.  I have reported the issue to LDV.

Had our G10 Executive serviced here this week. Tiffany is one of the nicest and honest service advisors you will ever meet. She was transparent with upfront service pricing in her  email. Confirmed the booking online. In person, she was an absolute pleasure to deal with. The van had its 10k service carried out and after the service, it seems as though there is very slight better pick up down low. Almost as though the engine is not as tight. We also had intermittent stinky aircon. An anti bacterial treatment was put through the system, and it seems to be OK now.
Very happy with the service here. They don't wash the car after service. I hate my car being washed at dealer services as they tend to introduce swirl marks. I like washing it on my own. Great staff. Great service. Will be back.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Eddy Nader
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Absolutely the most unprofessional car dealership I have ever dealt with. After agreeing on a price, the salesman, GARRY,  told us that he had a car in stock for us to pick up either Friday or Monday.
We proceeded to sell our existing company van, drive over to the dealership to put a deposit on the vehicle Garry said he could sell us, only for GARRY to inform us that he cant actually get a vehicle for another two or more weeks.
When I questioned him why he had told me differently, he just shrugged his shoulders and said I only just found out!!!!!!
He didn't even attempt to fix the situation, he just walked outside, over to the footpath to have a cigarette with two fellow workers.
LDV SHOULD BE EMBARRASSED TO HAVE THIS DEALERSHIP AS A FRANCHISEE!

Further, to your response below, you honestly expect  me to believe, in the 20 minutes from us hanging up the phone with Garry and arriving at the dealership he sold the vehicle to someone else? I think your salesman is telling a few porkies pies! BTW, we purchased the vehicle from another dealership, So much more professional than LDV Lansvale.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Aaron Schuurman
user_reviews_extended.Description:
The first time my G10 went in there it took 6 months for me to get it back. Then another time after getting the van towed there knowing the alternator was not working, this mechanic insisted it was the battery. After installing another battery and driving the car around for an hour or so only to get stuck he finally realised it was the alternator. Something a multimeter could have told him in a quick 30 second test.

To top all this off I was quoted on nankang tyres which I agreed to only to receive a different brand called roadshine.

Recently though my spare parts guy called 2 dealerships this being one of them. This was to enquire about some basic parts that they should have been able to identify and provide based on the vin number of the vehicle. Instead he was told that the part didn't exist. For 3 months my van has been off the road and it took my brother going in there to find the part himself on their system.

Their lack of professionalism and knowledge is beyond bad. If I could give them less than 1 star I would. Would never recommend this dealership or LDV in general.

Will be taking it further and reporting them to fair trading.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Emilie Lowe
user_reviews_extended.Description: Wouldn‚Äôt recommend - very poor (non-existent) after purchase service. My partner purchased a car for around $35,000 over 6 months ago. 3 months of rego was placed onto the car in error with him being told another 3 months would be placed on by the dealership when this was due. We have tried to get in contact multiple times and no follow through on any of the agreed upon actions. Have spoken a handful of times with promises that details would be sent through to action this rego payment with no luck. Very very disappointed as we were so excited over the purchase of this car.

user_reviews_extended.Name: lara Cortilla
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Avoid LDV Tuggerah at all costs. I dropped off my 2022 LDV D90 on 23 April for a keyless entry warranty repair. It's now 15 May and I still don't have my car. Not once have they called me‚ÄîI‚Äôve had to follow up every time.

I‚Äôve been fed excuse after excuse: ‚Äúwaiting for a code,‚Äù ‚Äúit‚Äôs out of our hands,‚Äù ‚Äúit's in the workshop,‚Äù and even a lie that the car was towed in (I drove it there myself). The complete lack of communication and accountability is appalling.

I called LDV Head Office to file a formal complaint and ask them to have Tuggerah contact me. They never did. Head Office‚Äôs only advice? ‚ÄúUse another service centre in future.‚Äù That says it all.

If you expect even basic customer service, stay far away from this dealership.

user_reviews_extended.Name: RenAe CuRby
user_reviews_extended.Description:
0 out of 10 on every level

I highly recommend you DO NOT use LDV Tuggerah for any reason, even if it is an emergency.

I attended LDV Tuggerah recently in the middle of an emergency, and the way I was treated by the service staff at the desk was absolutely disgusting.

Honestly, the list of reasons why I would steer clear of this particular service centre is beyond disgusting. I am literally gobsmacked as to how they are even still in operation.

Their customer service skills are terrible, their duty of care is appalling, and their communication skills are hands down the worst I‚Äôve seen; being in business myself I am speaking from over 25 years of experience.

Thank goodness for LDV Chatswood who came to my rescue, I have now adopted LDV Chatswood as my primary service centre; and that speaks volumes considering I reside on The Central Coast.

I will NEVER set foot back in LDV Tuggerah ever again. And I will NEVER recommend them to anyone! I will never forget the way they treated me, spoke to me, and handled my emergency situation.
If Google had an option to give 0 stars out of 5, then that‚Äôs exactly what they‚Äôd get; simply because that‚Äôs exactly what they deserve.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Richard Panton
user_reviews_extended.Description: Where do I start.We purchased 2 vans from ldv both had roof racks fitted incorrectly.Both had extra seats fitted and both compliance certificates we wrong. Found out after changing rego. The fuel cap cover is a cream colour not white like the rest of the van. As for our deliver 7 we were promised a tow pack in mid February now we are being told possibly may 30. That is six months from  purchase. Simply can't use this van for it's intended use. Promises but don't deliver. Just adding to this review. It's now 7 months and for whatever reason no one seems to want to return my 5 phone calls over the past 2 weeks.Very disappointed in ldv tuggerah. As far as where here to help other than your response to this there is no communication

user_reviews_extended.Name: Angela Malone
user_reviews_extended.Description: Absolutely terrible! I had a battery light issue, took it in and was told the car was fine, only to have same issue weeks later and had my car break down and needed towing. No loan cars available. I was told a TR has been put through to LDV but this could take weeks for an answer and they can't even order parts until LDV approve. Staff don't care about the inconvenience of not having a car and their attitude is unsympathetic. Maybe try managing your bookings a bit better, so you can fit the cars in that are faulty with out extended inconvenience.

user_reviews_extended.Description: As a Central Coast business, we always try to buy from other local businesses. Although I didn‚Äôt want to have to write this, I feel it‚Äôs needed. It‚Äôs disappointing when your local dealer says they do a job, but just don‚Äôt. It leaves you wondering about the other items in the list, ‚Äúticked off‚Äù, if a simple tyre pressure check isn‚Äôt actually done. We knew all of the tyres had lost pressure over time and one was slightly low when cold. Driving away from the service we got a low typre pressure warning (see picture) and had to go put air in the tyre. The service invoice specifically mentioned checking and correcting tyre pressures

user_reviews_extended.Description: I was greeted or should say not greeted by a female staff member sitting at the desk inside the front door who was very busy ... texting on her mobile. I walked around the showroom for about 5 minutes, even after looking at and in a vehicle right next to her desk for several minutes there was no acknowledgment, still busy texting. After realising I needed to approach the staff for assistance I asked to speak to someone about a vehicle, she replied would need to call a sales person, continued to finish texting before picking up the phone. She informed me all sales staff were busy and someone would speak to me when they were free, I was the only customer in the showroom and appeared to be the only customer at the time. Few minutes later a male sales staff member came in and asked me what I was looking for, after a short discussion that I was looking for a T60, we went to his office in another building to see what vehicles were available, I wasn't asked if I'd driven a T60, at no time was there an offer to take a T60 for a test drive. First time I've ever been to a car dealership that aren't interested in trying to sell you a car, every other time I've purchased a new vehicle the first thing they want to do is get you in the drivers seat. Maybe it's an LDV standard, this was the 2nd LDV dealership with poor customer service.

was searching and getting a few quotes with other cardealerships and ended up choosing Adam from Tynan LDV Sutherland.
From the moment we spoke he sounded so genuinely friendly, very helpful and professional. He was really attentive to all of my questions and explained everything thoroughly and always got back to me as quickly as possible.

Adam

Biggest mistake !!! start brought new car ldv d90 in April this year sound when steering appeared called to get it seen too waiting time of two weeks , booked the service for first 5,000 km July 1st and still car has been sitting in mechanics not been touched going on now 9 weeks  the ball joints snapped and was not aware of this been driving this new family car with my children !!!! The automatic break also is a problem and comes on when driving for no reason !!!

The communication in this time between the manager and the team and mechanics has been nothing but disappointing I would re think of purchasing a ldv and not waste your money !

user_reviews_extended.Name: Thomas Grant
user_reviews_extended.Description: Top draw selling the vehicle. After service department is diabolical. First of all took my T60 in for its 5k service,  got back home with the under tray full of oil, clearly not been cleaned after the oil change, oil all over my driveway... Then tried charging me someone else‚Äôs bill for 2k saying my tyres where bald, when in fact there brand new all terrains. Then got in my car for collection it absolutely stank like someone had eaten a kebab in it.  Took the car back for warranty paint due to rust spots appearing after it not even been a year old. Took it in march 10th, tried numerous times to contact the service manager with nothing. ‚Äú we will get call you back‚Äù with absolutely no communication. Now 4 months later with no call back regarding sorting out the rust spots. Stay well clear of LDV SERVICE, if I don‚Äôt get a call back this week I‚Äôll be contacting trading standards. So quick to get my money but now I want to rectify paint issues, no one to be seen. Give you the benefit of the doubt but 4 months with not a word is disgusting. The car will be parked up right outside your showroom with lemons on it by the time the weeks out.

user_reviews_extended.Name: GPAC Info
user_reviews_extended.Description: We purchased a LDV Deliver 9 van in 2022. The last year we have few warranty issues. user_reviews_extended.Name: Jamie Ng
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Bought a brand new LDV G10 last month. Car wouldn't start up yesterday and had to jump start it. Confusing since no lights were left on which may have drained the battery. Also a "gearbox faulty" error messaged popped up which was concerning. Took the car to the local shop who tested the battery and advised that the battery appears to be old and worn out ( running below 40%). He didn't try to sell me a new battery but suggested taking the car back to the local dealer instead of wasting money on a new replacement. Contacted the person that sold us the car but obviously he wanted nothing to do with us anymore. Was not his problem and out of his control.
Contacted service department who advised that their earliest availability was in 3 weeks and won't be able to see me any earlier. Surely that is not reasonable considering this was a "NEW" van we just purchased. Told the girl over the phone that we can't just stop work and wait 3 weeks for a service but apparently nothing she could do. I will now need to fork out $500 for a new battery. Not even a month in and already plenty of frustration.

user_reviews_extended.Description:
I‚Äôm extremely dissatisfied with the service I‚Äôve received from LDV Tweed Heads. My vehicle was brought in for several warranty issues, including the TPM sensor, blind side warning, and gearbox recall.

While the gearbox was replaced under warranty, it was later discovered during the first service that the transmission fluid had been underfilled by 4 litres during the second service. This level of negligence is unacceptable and could have caused significant damage to my vehicle‚Äôs transmission.

When I picked up my car, I was informed that the TPM sensors couldn‚Äôt be programmed because their machine wasn‚Äôt working, so I now have to rebook to get them fixed. Regarding the blind side monitor warning, while the team didn‚Äôt admit to not knowing how to fix it, it‚Äôs clear they don‚Äôt understand the root cause of the issue.

This is the third time I‚Äôve brought my car in for the same problems, and nothing has been resolved. The repeated failures, lack of accountability, and poor communication have been incredibly frustrating. I expected a much higher standard of service from LDV Tweed Heads and do not recommend them.

user_reviews_extended.Description:
I purchased a brand-new LDV T60 Lux in July, and it‚Äôs been nothing but a nightmare ever since. After only 1,000 km, the ‚ÄúCheck 4WD‚Äù light came on. When I contacted the dealership, I was told it was safe to drive and they‚Äôd check it at the 5,000 km service. I also reported a strange noise and gear-skipping issues, but after the service, the check light was still on, and they assured me they‚Äôd contact LDV for more information.
Weeks went by with no updates. I called every week, only to be brushed off each time. Finally, I was told to bring the vehicle back in, and it‚Äôs now been at the dealership for two weeks with zero communication. I‚Äôve been calling nearly every day, only to hear, ‚ÄúSomeone will call you back.‚Äù Yet no one ever does.
To make matters worse, when I went to retrieve my tools from the tray last weekend, I found they‚Äôd left it open during recent storms. My tools were completely soaked and damaged. Despite daily calls and emails, I‚Äôve received no response from anyone, even after escalating it to the top of the dealership. This level of customer service is beyond appalling. Avoid this place at all costs‚Äîdon‚Äôt buy or service your vehicle here.

Where to begin with this dealership?  To put it simply DO NOT buy a new from this dealership. The after sales is absolutely horrible to deal with. We purchased a brand new LDV D90 for $51,000. After two weeks the vehicle had a fault which although after further investigation ( at my expense) appeared to be a reasonably minor issue and which should have been easy to fix and identify but now has turned into 2 month saga. Expect to wait up to 2 weeks to a month to get your vehicle seen to by a mechanic then that mechanic doesn‚Äôt identify the fault. Then pay your own mechanic to diagnose the issue which he finds easily and quickly. I then return back to the dealership with all the info of the issue only to be told ‚Äúwe need to do our own investigation‚Äù and you‚Äôre wasting your time. Funnily enough they did their ‚Äúown investigation ‚Äú before and found nothing wrong. Rude, snarky and generally difficult to deal with would sum up the after sales at the dealership. So do yourself a favour and save yourself stress and hassle because trust me their dealership treats it‚Äôs first time customers
like they are of no importance whatsoever. The dealer principal obviously has no interest in getting any repeat sales. We will buy our next new car in two years time somewhere else. I‚Äôd suggest if you want and LDV or another vehicle to buy it somewhere else.

I called the dealership at exactly 330pm today from Lansvale, asking if they had an LDV G10 in stock so I could come and have a look at it. The man who answered the sales phone replied with "yes, come on in and I'd be happy to show it to you"  So we drove straight to Campbelltown (40 min drive) only to get here to find there is not one available. user_reviews_extended.Description:
I want to give a huge shoutout to Andy at MacArthur LDV for his incredible support and service. When my van broke down due to a timing belt and alternator issue, I was really stressed and didn‚Äôt know what to do. I didn‚Äôt even have an appointment, but Andy still went out of his way to book me in and made sure everything got sorted.

He handled the whole situation with genuine care and professionalism, and even helped me get the repairs done under warranty ‚Äî which was a huge relief. It‚Äôs rare to come across someone so helpful, understanding, and committed to customer service. Andy truly went above and beyond, and I‚Äôm so grateful for everything he did.

If you‚Äôre ever in need of assistance with your vehicle, I highly recommend asking for Andy at MacArthur LDV. Absolute legend!

user_reviews_extended.Name: Brooke Camara
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Extremely poor experience with LDV Macarthur. My husband brought his LDV T60 in for a routine service and was told everything was fine. Days later, he had to return it due to engine issues and was then told the engine needs replacing.

Since then, we've dealt with confusing and conflicting information, no clear updates, and zero accountability. At one point we were told the issue was a loose number plate and some loose bolts, only to be told later that the engine still had major problems. Despite requesting a loan car, none was provided. We had also been offered to pick up our vehicle and keep driving it until they "figure" out the problem. Also LDV Head Office couldn‚Äôt even confirm a case had been raised.

It‚Äôs now been almost 6 weeks without the vehicle, causing huge disruption to our family. We‚Äôve had to chase every update ourselves. The lack of communication and responsibility is completely unacceptable. Would not recommend.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Moudz
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Ive bout. Brand new t60 max plus 2024 witch looked new but wasn‚Äôt a brand new car at all I‚Äôve never seen worse than that imagine they sell you a brand new car and out of a sudden you find out it‚Äôs full of rust and ANT NEST IMAGINE!!some parts been changed,they will tell you the car is brand new until you take it to a professional mechanic and you will be SHOCKED
DO NOT DEAL WITH THIS COMPANY
And I am taking legal action very soon and whoever you see is the from the manager to the customer services
MOST BE AVOIDED AND TAK LEGAL ACTION AGIANS THEM.

user_reviews_extended.Description:
My 5 stars are for Daniel Slinger in the service/parts department. He could not have been more friendly and helpful in fitting the roller cover to our new T60 Max. His communication was great. He met me on arrival and made sure I was ok with the hire car given to me. He called me to advise it was ready earlier than expected. On collection he explained everything clearly.
On the down side, we did have to wait a lot longer than expected for the parts to arrive and to have it fitted. We were told it would be around 3 weeks after picking up our vehicle. I began chasing it up after 6 weeks as we were hearing nothing. It was a further 3 weeks before it was sorted

user_reviews_extended.Name: Peter Irving
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Worst customer service I have ever experienced. It took me more than 10 phone calls to recieve a call back from service LDV (every phone call was diverted to a reception where the girls were lovely, and assured me messages were passed on)

Once I had finally received a call back I booked my vehicle in and it was more than a month before I could drop it off, which is fine, I get that everyone is busy.

Service LDV then had my vehicle for roughly  two weeks without a single phone call updating me as to what was happening, during that time I had the same issue where no one was returning my call. I was also told that I needed to provide service receipts and that my vehicle had not been seen because of this, no one had told me this during the time they had the car or prior to this in the month I was waiting for my car to be seen.

I finally travelled there to confront the manager Ronald who was very nice but really didn‚Äôt take any interest or ownership of the fact that it took me so many attempts to get in contact with him or his staff.

Ultimately my warranty claim was denied and I‚Äôm ok with that, that is not the reason that I am writing this review even though I do disagree with it.

While on hold waiting for a phone call to be answered the recorded msg talks constantly about customer service being the utmost importance, it is so frustrating.

Avoid this place like the plague.

user_reviews_extended.Name: B Grg
user_reviews_extended.Description:
The service was way beyond unsatisfactory. The issues were delay in service, lack of communication, unprofessional handling and poor explanation. Despite my efforts to address the issue at the time, the staff seemed uninterested in resolving my concerns.

As a paying customer, anyone would expect a certain standard of professionalism and respect, which was clearly lacking in this instance. It is disappointing to receive such treatment, especially from an establishment that claims to value customer satisfaction.

I request that this matter be reviewed and would appreciate a follow-up regarding how you intend to address it to ensure future customers do not face similar issues. Also, I would suggest the customer service team to look into the reviews and not expect customers to reach out to them which is double handling. I could go on and write an essay but I shall just end here.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Carol
user_reviews_extended.Description: I should have read previous reviews before dealing with this car yard as I wouldn‚Äôt call it a dealership. As previous customers have already said zero care factor . We bought our LDV on good faith as we lived 6 1/2 hours away  it was the only one that met our cryteria that was available immediately  so we needed to be able to take vehicle when we went down. Paid upfront as Max said I couldn‚Äôt pay on the day otherwise we needed a bank cheque but we live 2hrs from a bank and being told Friday  wasn‚Äôt an option of getting one. On our way down Max rang and said he was off sick so see Greg when we asked for Greg he said he knew nothing about it and dismissed us very quickly to someone else who intern came out with a key and said paperwork would be ready soon. We told him we knew nothing of the vehicle and was told ‚Äúoh Greg maybe able to spare a few minutes‚Äù.After paperwork was done we were told  ‚Äúok folkes good to go ‚Äú on which we advised again we had not been given any run through of vehicle . ‚ÄúTake a seat and wait for Greg ‚Äú we waited awhile then went out to the vehicle and tried to work things out ourselves but it wouldn‚Äôt start so we thought ok we are new to this must be doing something wrong , few minutes later the key giver came out opened the bonnet and jump started it , wtf it‚Äôs a new car ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. Finally a fella from the Nissan side of the car yard came out and done his best to run us through the basics. We were told nothing about servicing , we were told it had 15klms on it when indeed it had 75klms when we drove out, we were told it would have a full tank of diesel when it only had just over 1/2 tank. There was no congrats or enjoy your vehicle or thanks for  buying from us. Zero care factor . Would not recommend them to my worst enemy . It‚Äôs all well and good to respond as in previous reviews but it‚Äôs just words nothing has been done about the issues as far as I can see . ü§¨ By the way the 1 was for the help from the Nissan side of the business . Pointless in telling people to email customer care as it‚Äôs no care as far as I am concerned even a phone call resulted in well I appreciate your concerns and sorry this happened but can‚Äôt do anything now it‚Äôs already happened .

user_reviews_extended.Name: Eric Kravos
user_reviews_extended.Description:
The experience with this branch has been extremely poor and underwealming since purchase to say the least. They would get a 0 if I was able.
Delivery of the car came incomplete without additional parts ordered. No communication from the team to advise they were on order and when queried, they fumbled their way through sorting the issue. Was lucky to even get an apology from the manager. Further, his attitude was again poor when raising an issue regarding multiple scratches on the vehicle upon collection, he basically tried to sweep it under the carpet. After backwards and forwards I finally was able to get them to agree to repair the scratches. My tornacay cover was on "order" and took multiple weeks after collection and chasing them up to actually get this booked in to be fitted. There was also a large gouge out of my roof rail which was also missed by their quality control people. Again, this took weeks to get resolved and when finally repaired was sub par.
Finally my latest issue which I am still trying to resolve relates to my books which have gone missing after having my first service at the start of October. Multiple phone calls and promises to be called back only to never actually be called. Then their answer is that they don't remove books from the cars at all. How do they fill them in then? I was put on hold for 40 minutes after refusing to be called back and seeking resolution. Ended up hanging up due to the time frame and received no call back again. They are refusing responsibility for thenlost books and are trying to get me to pay for the replacement.
This issue will be escalated to head office and fair trading as this mob are completely useless, their customer service and resolution management is pathetic and non existent. They get your money and then you are worthless and treated like crap.

When I asked the guy to show me how to use the car he said I can't I'm busy if you came on your appointment I would have showed you. what the hell someone tell me this is normal. l literally turned off the car twice on the highway because I wasn't confident with the technology of the vehicle. Let alone their customer service I'd rate that a -10.

Thank you

user_reviews_extended.Description:

user_reviews_extended.Name: Dayleo
user_reviews_extended.Description:
I bought a new LDV here. I had a minor issue where the gear shifter retainer clip came loose from the transmission. The vehicle was not drivable, a big problem with an easy fix.

Initially i dealt with Castle hill LDV - Unhelpful/rude and estimating 1 month before even diagnosing it and 2 months wait for a rental car.

Macarthur LDV - Maj in sales gave me the time of day to listen to my problem and offer an immediate hire car. Jamie/Rosie (Service) arranged for a tow from Castle hill LDV.

They got my vehicle in for diagnosis quickly and completed the simple - but critical repair.

LDV Castle Hill and the LDV Call Centre let me down. I was upset and angry.

LDV Macarthur were Polite, Helpful and listened to me when I pleaded my case.

Thank you Maj, Rosie and Jamie

user_reviews_extended.Name: Nathan B
user_reviews_extended.Description:

Never get a LDV for them. No support and warranty means nothing to them..they keep saying ring LDV direct, even know I got the car from them.. LDV Australia keep saying go to the dealer.

Have to take this higher now

user_reviews_extended.Description: Probably the worst customer service Iv experienced. Then I could get an estimate on how long it will take to fix‚Ä¶  I also had to leave it there for the entire day, perfect when your trying to run a buisness.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Matthew Summerville
user_reviews_extended.Description: Sold me an ‚Äúas new‚Äù Silverado. Car had a puncture in the side wall which was repaired by them presale and not disclosed but had a leak. Drove from Manly to Macarthur to get it repaired again, still leaked air and car began wobbling profusely at above 80kmh. Was told to then use the spare and come back again to MacArthur for replacement, upon investigating the spare see that it isn‚Äôt full size as is supplied with new ones and is a space saver unfit to drive with. Was then told by salesman Gary that everything was becoming too messy because I wanted to use a local repairer due to safety concerns driving 70kms on a highway to get it replaced, and that offer to replace the tyre was rescinded. The worst customer service I have ever experienced in my life.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Anthony Charara
user_reviews_extended.Description: I recently purchased a car with LDV Macarthur. I want to thank Alex and Greg for their honesty and for working with the customer on their level. user_reviews_extended.Name: Tiarne Smith

user_reviews_extended.Name: Michael Carr
user_reviews_extended.Description:
LDV T60 Luxe
I purchased this vehicle in July 2022
Within the first 1000km it went into a limp mode which leaves a vehicle with no power at anytime until you switch it off for 5 minutes and let it reset
The service team at Von Bibra Southport QLD could not diagnose the problem.
During the next few months the vehicle continued to go into the limp mode.
After several times they replaced the accelerator control.
This still didn‚Äôt fix the original problem.
On the eighth occasion of this occurrence I was fortunate to be in the proximity of a dealership and asked the manager to view the vehicle.
To his credit he purchased the vehicle back under the warranty.
LDV made no further contact with me after logging the issue with the customer service team at LDV head office.
They didn‚Äôt provide the dealership with the correct tools to diagnose the issue
They also made no attempt to make a vehicle safe and fit for purpose.
I even placed a call to LDV customer service head office after I returned the vehicle to ask why they didn‚Äôt bother to follow up.
The reply was What else do you want.
I replied a vehicle fit for purpose.
A dealership to have the proper tools to diagnose problems and to repair them.
The LDV customer service team at Head Office confirmed to me that they could not care less that a LDV vehicle can cut out at anytime and place with no power at any speed/time/ place leaving the driver and passengers in a highly dangerous position with no power to move from harm‚Äôs way .
Even after stating how dangerous and unroadworthy the vehicle was no attempt was made to find out additional information to assist them in finding out how to prevent this from happening to other vehicles.
I would normally say
All care and no responsibility from the customer service Head Office Team
On this occasion the customer service Team at LDV Australia just don‚Äôt care about their customers and take no responsibility for making a unsafe vehicle
I would never purchase a vehicle again from LDV that makes and maintains such a unsafe vehicle and makes no attempt to ensure that the customer is heard.

user_reviews_extended.Name: Marc Phaochinda
user_reviews_extended.Description:
2/7/2023

Car wise LDV
1 Morley Ave
Kingswood 2747 NSW

Subject: Strong Dissatisfaction and Embarrassment due to Vehicle Breakdown

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing this letter to express my extreme dissatisfaction and profound embarrassment regarding the recent breakdown of the LDV Delivery 9 bus that I purchased from your esteemed company. The incident, which occurred in the middle of the road, not only caused significant inconvenience but also left me feeling embarrassed and humiliated in front of others.

On Friday 23/6/2023, I excitedly acquired the aforementioned vehicle from your dealership, anticipating a reliable and seamless driving experience. However, this perception was shattered when, on Friday 30/7/2023, the car suddenly malfunctioned, leaving me stranded and helpless on a busy street.

The unexpected breakdown attracted attention from fellow motorists and pedestrians, creating an uncomfortable situation that I could not escape. It was deeply embarrassing to have the car fail in such a conspicuous manner, causing disruption and inconvenience to not only myself but also others who were inconvenienced by the resulting traffic congestion.

As a customer who placed trust in your company's product, I expected the car to provide a reliable mode of transportation. Unfortunately, the breakdown has undermined that trust and has resulted in significant embarrassment and inconvenience for me. The incident has also raised concerns about the vehicle's quality and reliability.

I implore you to take immediate action to rectify this matter. I request a thorough investigation into the root cause of the breakdown and a comprehensive repair of the vehicle at no additional cost to me. Additionally, I anticipate a reasonable compensation for the embarrassment, inconvenience, and any associated costs that this incident has caused.

It is my sincere hope that your company recognizes the gravity of this situation and takes swift and appropriate measures to address it. I trust that you value your customers and their satisfaction, and I expect a timely response outlining the steps your company will take to resolve this matter satisfactorily.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter. I eagerly await your response and an adequate resolution that will restore my faith in your brand and alleviate the embarrassment and inconvenience caused by this distressing incident.

Yours sincerely,

user_reviews_extended.Name: Michael Steen Nielsen
user_reviews_extended.Description:
Outstanding Service at LDV Windsor ‚Äì Fast, Reliable, and Hassle-Free

I‚Äôve been driving an LDV T60 since 2021, with around 70,000 km on the clock. Recently, I noticed a rattling noise coming from the engine compartment and suspected it might be the alternator bearing on its way out. I took the car to LDV Windsor on a Monday morning (30/9/24), and after a quick diagnostic, Service Manager Robert confirmed my suspicion.

Robert immediately assured me that the issue was covered under warranty. While they didn‚Äôt have the part in stock, they ordered it and promised to call me as soon as it arrived. By Thursday morning, Robert gave me a call to say the new alternator had arrived, and if I could drop the car off straight away, they‚Äôd get it sorted the same day. True to his word, I dropped it off and by 4:00 pm, the car was ready to go!

I‚Äôm genuinely impressed with the level of service and communication I received from LDV Windsor‚Äîespecially Robert. It‚Äôs rare to come across this kind of customer care nowadays.

As for the LDV T60 itself, aside from this alternator issue, it‚Äôs been fantastic. Apart from standard servicing and a set of new tyres, I‚Äôve had no problems at all. I‚Äôm really happy with the car and LDV Windsor. Highly recommend!
